column5: Wish we could have this fishing close to home here in Ontario
That is a cool vid. I think that's an Atlantic though.
Good stuff , but you wouldnt catch me on ice that close to moving water lol
Interesting to see the C&R ethic in Lapland, too, because that salmon sure looked tasty.
Never fished Dunnville in the winter?
LOL there was guys standing at the edge of ice by the dam  this year casting long rods into the open water ..NUT BARS ..you would be very supprised how thick ice can get close to open water ..
In the bays of Lake Superior they catch kings thru the ice....must be nuts on the drag!
